What is the outlook for Tabes Dorsalis ?,"If left untreated, tabes dorsalis can lead to paralysis, dementia, and blindness. Existing nerve damage cannot be reversed.",NINDS,Tabes Dorsalis
what research (or clinical trials) is being done for Tabes Dorsalis ?,"The NINDS supports and conducts research on neurodegenerative disorders, such as tabes dorsalis, in an effort to find ways to prevent, treat, an
